languages.text: "Этот безумец подкупил стражников, и они не обратили внимания на мои крики! Посмотрим, как они запоют, когда узнают, что пришлось вмешаться лично Звездн{mf|ому|ой} Госпо{mf|дину|же}!"
"This madman bribed the guards so that they would ignore my cries! I'm sure they'll be singing a different tune when they find out the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} had to intervene personally!"
languages.original_text: "Этот безумец подкупил стражников, и они не обратили внимания на мои крики! Посмотрим, как они запоют, когда узнают, что пришлось вмешаться лично Звездн{mf|ому|ой} Госпо{mf|дину|же}!"

traits.locale_text: "This madman bribed the guards so that they would ignore my cries! I'm sure they'll be singing a different tune when they find out the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} had to intervene personally!"
"This madman bribed the guards so that they would ignore my cries! I'm sure they'll be singing a different tune when they find out the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} had to intervene personally!"

{n}Having lost his advantage, the attacker stills, warily eyeing the strangers in front of him. The freed nobleman trembles and wails,{/n} "This scum bribed the guards, can you imagine? I'm sure they'll be singing a different tune when they find out the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} had to intervene personally!"
"This madman bribed the guards so that they would ignore my cries! I'm sure they'll be singing a different tune when they find out the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} had to intervene personally!"
"This madman bribed the guards so that they would ignore my cries! I'm sure they'll be singing a different tune when they find out the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} had to intervene personally!"
"This madman bribed the guards so that they would ignore my cries! I'm sure they'll be singing a different tune when they find out the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} had to intervene personally!"
"This madman bribed the guards so that they would ignore my cries! I'm sure they'll be singing a different tune when they find out the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} had to intervene personally!"

languages.text: “所有守卫都被这个疯子买通了，他们对我的呼救视而不见！不过我敢肯定，等他们发现来自上界的大人您亲自干预这样事情之后，肯定就要变脸了！”
languages.original_text: "This madman bribed the guards so that they would ignore my cries! I'm sure they'll be singing a different tune when they find out the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} had to intervene personally!"

traits.locale_text: “所有守卫都被这个疯子买通了，他们对我的呼救视而不见！不过我敢肯定，等他们发现来自上界的大人您亲自干预这样事情之后，肯定就要变脸了！”

languages.text: 「この狂人は、衛兵たちに賄賂を渡して、私の叫び声を無視させたんですよ！天の{mf|君|姫}が直々に介入されたと知れば、あいつらも態度を一変させるに違いありません！」
languages.original_text: "This madman bribed the guards so that they would ignore my cries! I'm sure they'll be singing a different tune when they find out the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} had to intervene personally!"

traits.locale_text: 「この狂人は、衛兵たちに賄賂を渡して、私の叫び声を無視させたんですよ！天の{mf|君|姫}が直々に介入されたと知れば、あいつらも態度を一変させるに違いありません！」

languages.text: «¡Este lunático sobornó a los guardias para que ignoraran mis gritos! Seguro que la cosa cambiará cuando sepan que nuestr{mf|o Señor|a Señora} Celestial ha tenido que intervenir personalmente!».
languages.original_text: "This madman bribed the guards so that they would ignore my cries! I'm sure they'll be singing a different tune when they find out the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} had to intervene personally!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Este lunático sobornó a los guardias para que ignoraran mis gritos! Seguro que la cosa cambiará cuando sepan que nuestr{mf|o Señor|a Señora} Celestial ha tenido que intervenir personalmente!».

languages.text: "Bu deli, beni görmezden gelsinler diye muhafızlara rüşvet verdi! Semavi {mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin} bizzat müdahale ettiğini öğrenince kaçacak delik arayacaklar!"
languages.original_text: "This madman bribed the guards so that they would ignore my cries! I'm sure they'll be singing a different tune when they find out the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} had to intervene personally!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu deli, beni görmezden gelsinler diye muhafızlara rüşvet verdi! Semavi {mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin} bizzat müdahale ettiğini öğrenince kaçacak delik arayacaklar!"

languages.text: « Ce dément a soudoyé les gardes pour qu'ils ignorent mes appels à l'aide ! Je suis sûr qu'ils seront dans leurs petits souliers quand ils apprendront que Votre Céleste Seigneurie a dû intervenir personnellement ! »
languages.original_text: "This madman bribed the guards so that they would ignore my cries! I'm sure they'll be singing a different tune when they find out the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} had to intervene personally!"

traits.locale_text: « Ce dément a soudoyé les gardes pour qu'ils ignorent mes appels à l'aide ! Je suis sûr qu'ils seront dans leurs petits souliers quand ils apprendront que Votre Céleste Seigneurie a dû intervenir personnellement ! »

languages.text: "Dieser Irre hat die Wachen bestochen, damit sie meine Schreie ignorieren! Ich bin sicher, sie schlagen andere Töne an, wenn sie herausfinden, dass {mf|der himmlische Herr|die himmlische Herrin} persönlich eingreifen musste!"
languages.original_text: "This madman bribed the guards so that they would ignore my cries! I'm sure they'll be singing a different tune when they find out the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} had to intervene personally!"

traits.locale_text: "Dieser Irre hat die Wachen bestochen, damit sie meine Schreie ignorieren! Ich bin sicher, sie schlagen andere Töne an, wenn sie herausfinden, dass {mf|der himmlische Herr|die himmlische Herrin} persönlich eingreifen musste!"
